content.prompt: Which of the following is true of a presidential veto of a piece of legislation?

choices.label: It is not binding unless supported by the cabinet.
It can only be sustained on revenue bills.
It is automatically reviewed by the United States Supreme Court.
It is subject to approval by a congressional committee.

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
